main.name: Samvita Karkal
main.description: Let's discuss our next project, probably over a cup of coffee?

education.school: Sinhgad College of Engineering, Pune, India
education.degree: Bachelor in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering

experience.title: Application Developer
experience.description: Seamlessly upgraded React (v16 to v18) and Rails (v6 to v7), addressing security vulnerabilities and boosting performance. Spearheaded React Testing Framework implementation, achieving robust test coverage. Solo-managed a product with JIRA and Sentry, reducing reported bugs and delivering bug-free features. Migrated application search to Elasticsearch, improving search efficiency.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Adeptly integrated CircleCI for streamlined automated pipelines, optimizing testing and deployments. Proficiently delivered top-notch web products, enhancing user experience through Tailwind CSS integration. Employed Rspec in a TDD approach for comprehensive test coverage, ensuring high-quality, efficient, and reliable application development.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.description: Proficiently integrated Twilio into a React project, enhancing communication with SMS and video calling features. Skillfully crafted reusable forms and appealing components using MUI, leading to an impressive up to 120% rise in user sign-up rates. Awarded ACE accolade for exceptional design and timely project achievements.
